description.value:
Requirements You are under the effects of a mutagen.

You redirect a mutagen within your body to spit a stream of stomach acid at a foe. A creature within 30 feet takes @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage for every 2 levels you have, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. On a failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). The mutagen's duration immediately ends.
